567.name: Feugen

567.text_zh: 亡语：如果斯塔拉格也在本局对战中死亡，召唤塔迪乌斯。

725.name: Dark Wispers
725.text: Choose One - Summon 5 Wisps; or Give a minion +5/+5 and Taunt.
725.text_zh: 抉择：召唤5个小精灵；或者使一个随从获得+5/+5并具有嘲讽。

604.name: Stoneskin Gargoyle
604.text: At the start of your turn, restore this minion to full Health.
604.text_zh: 在你的回合开始时，为该随从恢复所有生命值。

157.name: Starfall
157.text: Choose One - Deal 5 damage to a minion; or 2 damage to all enemy minions.
157.text_zh: 抉择：对一个随从造成5点伤害；或者对所有敌方随从造成2点伤害。

602.name: Echoing Ooze
602.text: Battlecry: Summon an exact copy of this minion at the end of the turn.
602.text_zh: 战吼：在回合结束时召唤一个该随从的复制。

158.name: Sunfury Protector
158.text_zh: 战吼：使相邻的随从获得嘲讽。

749.name: Ogre Brute
749.text: 50% chance to attack the wrong enemy.

11.name: Deathwing
11.text: Battlecry: Destroy all other minions and discard your hand.
11.text_zh: 战吼：消灭所有其他随从，并弃掉你的手牌。

48.name: Blood Knight
48.text: Battlecry: All minions lose Divine Shield. Gain +3/+3 for each Shield lost.
48.text_zh: 战吼：所有随从失去圣盾。每有一个随从失去圣盾，便获得+3/+3。

47.name: Big Game Hunter
47.text: Battlecry: Destroy a minion with an Attack of 7 or more.
47.text_zh: 战吼：消灭一个攻击力大于或等于7的随从。

42.name: Ancient of Lore
42.text: Choose One - Draw 2 cards; or Restore 5 Health.
42.text_zh: 抉择：抽两张牌；或者恢复5点生命值。

43.name: Ancient of War
43.text: Choose One - +5 Attack; or +5 Health and Taunt.
43.text_zh:
抉择：
+5攻击力；或者+5生命值并具有嘲讽。

957.name: Nexus-Champion Saraad
957.text: Inspire: Add a random spell to your hand.
957.text_zh: 激励：随机将一张法术牌置入你的手牌。

956.name: Chillmaw
956.text: Taunt Deathrattle: If you're holding a Dragon, deal 3 damage to all minions.
956.text_zh: 嘲讽，亡语：如果你的手牌中有龙牌，则对所有随从造成3点伤害。

10.name: Cenarius
10.text: Choose One - Give your other minions +2/+2; or Summon two 2/2 Treants with Taunt.
10.text_zh: 抉择：使你的所有其他随从获得+2/+2；或者召唤两个2/2并具有嘲讽的树人。

476.name: Youthful Brewmaster
476.text: Battlecry: Return a friendly minion from the battlefield to your hand.
476.text_zh: 战吼：使一个友方随从从战场上移回你的手牌。

474.name: Wrath
474.text: Choose One - Deal 3 damage to a minion; or 1 damage and draw a card.
474.text_zh: 抉择：对一个随从造成3点伤害；或者造成1点伤害并抽一张牌。
